about_the_game:
This DLC consists of 4 parts:

  • An in-game guide to help you make the right choices during your dialogues. (Can be toggled on or off at any time).



  • A guide accessible while navigating in the game, providing you with the optimal order of characters to meet in order to unlock all the game scenes.

  • An external PDF guide to help you locate all the collectible items and the locations of the clues for the final puzzle.

  • A password when passing the wheel to be able to choose each action instead of leaving it to chance. More than 200 possible combinations!

Enjoy Corrupted Paradise to the fullest!

content_descriptors.notes:
Corrupted Paradise is a dating adventure with frequent and graphic depictions of sexual interactions between consenting adults. Mature content in this game includes but is not limited to: Lewd Language, Blowjobs, Handjobs, Consensual BDSM, Exhibition, voyeurism. Group Sex, Polyamory, Lesbian Sex.
In this game, you must play a woman AND a man.

detailed_description:
This DLC consists of 4 parts:

  • An in-game guide to help you make the right choices during your dialogues. (Can be toggled on or off at any time).



  • A guide accessible while navigating in the game, providing you with the optimal order of characters to meet in order to unlock all the game scenes.

  • An external PDF guide to help you locate all the collectible items and the locations of the clues for the final puzzle.

  • A password when passing the wheel to be able to choose each action instead of leaving it to chance. More than 200 possible combinations!

Enjoy Corrupted Paradise to the fullest!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz core duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0-capable graphics card/integrated GPU
  • Storage: 10 MB available space

name: Corrupted Paradise : Walkthrough / Solution

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz core duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or directX 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
